AdditionalFields.Value: Advances in Science of Cancer Health Disparities

Description: Implementation research to advance global cancer prevention, care, and control is a relatively nascent field. In this session, the speakers will present a broad overview of implementation research priorities in global oncology and will make an evidence-informed case for embedding an equity lens into implementation research methods. Selected case studies will be described that span the cancer continuum and will include pragmatic examples from a variety of contexts including different resource settings and world regions. Challenges and opportunities to advance the role of implementation science in cancer health disparities research will be explored in the Q&A session.
SearchResultBody: ADR02. Applying an Equity Lens to Implementation Research: A Pathway to Reduce Cancer Health Disparities
Title: Applying an Equity Lens to Implementation Research: A Pathway to Reduce Cancer Health Disparities
